product_summary: Audiogest is an automatic transcription and summarization platform designed to save users time and effort. With support for 99+ languages, Audiogest can transcribe and summarize audio and video files in 5 minutes or less. The platform uses AI-driven technology to generate accurate transcripts and summaries, and also allows users to edit and export transcripts in various formats. Audiogest can be integrated with popular apps like Google Drive, Google Meet, and Zoom, and offers flexible pricing starting at €4 per hour of transcript.
product_pros: Fast turnaround time (5 minutes or less)
Easy to use and edit transcripts
product_cons: May not be suitable for very long or complex audio/video files
Accuracy may vary depending on the quality of the audio/video recording
May require additional editing for perfect accuracy
Pricing can add up for frequent users

product_usecases.details: Audiogest can quickly and accurately transcribe interviews, making it easy to capture and analyze the key points of the conversation.
Use Audiogest to summarize important meetings, providing a concise overview of the key decisions and action items.
Audiogest can generate subtitles for videos, making them accessible to a wider audience and improving viewer engagement.
With support for 99+ languages, Audiogest can translate foreign language audio or video into text, breaking down language barriers.
Audiogest can transcribe and summarize customer feedback, providing valuable insights into customer sentiment and preferences.

product_toolfor.details: Audiogest can help researchers and journalists transcribe and analyze interviews, speeches, and other audio/video content.
Students and educators can use Audiogest to transcribe lectures, take notes, and improve their understanding of course materials.
Audiogest can help businesses and professionals transcribe meetings, summarize conference calls, and create subtitles for videos.
Content creators can use Audiogest to transcribe and summarize podcasts, webinars, and other audio/video content.
Audiogest can help language learners improve their listening and comprehension skills by providing transcripts and summaries of native speakers.

product_pricing: Pay-as-you-go pricing starting at €4 per hour of transcript.
